name: piano-keyboard-simulator
description: A virtual piano keyboard that can be played with a computer keyboard, a mouse, or touch inputs. Users can play one of four different instrument sounds, mimic the sustain and soften pedals on a grand piano, record their playing, and download recordings as an .mp3 file.

scripts.dev: cd server && npm i && npm start && cd client && npm i && npm start

author: Ashley Mays
